ownersTab.title: For pet owners
ownersTab.shortText: It is highly recommended to meet the chosen PetSitter well before the scheduled service, accompanied by your dog or cat in particular.
ownersTab.fullText: It is highly recommended to meet the chosen PetSitter well before the scheduled service, accompanied by your dog or cat in particular. A brief conversation of a few minutes with the PetSitter and a prior visit to the place where your animal will be kept can avoid many misunderstandings. Also, make sure the PetSitter has registered their activity with the relevant authorities. Looking to combine pleasure and additional income without financial risk? Register for free here as a PetSitter for a 3-month trial period, with no further commitment. Then a subscription without automatic renewal will be offered from €29 VAT inc. per quarter!

appTab.title: A simple and secure application
appTab.shortText: EuroPetSitter connects pet owners with service providers throughout Belgium for various services.
appTab.fullText: EuroPetSitter connects pet owners with animal service providers offering various missions throughout Belgium: boarding (+12h), day care (-12h), home visits, walks and excursions. Through our application, there are no registration fees or commissions to be paid by the pet owner. PetSitters set their rates and keep all their earnings. EuroPetSitter generates its revenue solely through advertising space and operates as a digital directory with a search engine.

sittersTab.title: For animal service providers
sittersTab.shortText: Would you like to promote your animal services business or start a new activity without financial risk?
sittersTab.fullText: Would you like to promote your animal services business or start a new activity without financial risk? In your advertising space, you can present yourself through text or photos. Specify precisely the types of animals you care for, the services offered, the space available for animals, as well as your daily and weekly rates. Also add relevant information such as the presence of children or not, or the care environment. Interested? Register for free as a PetSitter for a 3-month trial period, with no commitment. Satisfied? You can renew your subscription at your convenience: €29 for 3 months, €49 for 6 months, or €96 for one year, VAT inc., without automatic renewal.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: How to choose the right PetSitter?
faq.a1: To choose the right PetSitter, we recommend carefully reading profiles and reviews, checking qualifications and experience, organizing a preliminary meeting with your pet, and discussing in detail your expectations and your pet's specific needs.
faq.q2: What are the benefits of using EuroPetSitter?
faq.a2:
Free of charge: Access to the search block and direct contact with the PetSitter of your choice are completely free. EuroPetSitter does not charge any commission on payments made to PetSitters affiliated with our application. This rare, if not unique, economic model among similar applications guarantees you transparent pricing.

Speed: With just 6 criteria, you get a list of PetSitters that most precisely match your expectations, thus avoiding wasted time with unsuccessful contacts.

Clarity: The PetSitter's profile provides you with essential information: types of animals cared for, accepted missions with possible options, location, daily and weekly rates. Moreover, you will learn more about their living environment (apartment or country house with or without young children) as well as the possibility of picking up and returning your pet, administering medication and much more.
faq.q3: How to place an ad on EuroPetSitter?
faq.a3: In order to place their profile, the animal service provider must identify themselves and subscribe to a subscription. Every new registrant will benefit from a first and unique free subscription for 3 months, as a trial with no further commitment. Once your profile is validly completed, it will be put online. From then on, all pet owners will be able to view it and contact you directly.
faq.q4: How to delete my account as a PetSitter?
faq.a4: Don't worry, if you no longer wish to promote your services on our platform, temporarily or permanently, simply use the 'suspend my account' or 'delete my account' option as appropriate in your customer area and your profile will no longer be visible. There is no automatic renewal of subscriptions on our platform!
faq.q5: How to book and pay for a service with the PetSitter?
faq.a5: You can submit your request for an animal service reservation directly to the PetSitter of your choice. The cost of services is to be paid directly to your PetSitter. EuroPetSitter does not charge any commission on these payments.

philosophy.text1: With EuroPetSitter, pet owners pay no registration fees or 20% commission on each service, unlike most other similar applications. Every PetSitter affiliated with EuroPetSitter sets their own rates and keeps all their earnings.
